mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATED) VALUES (#{board_name}, #{board_title},#{board_content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATED FROM BOARD
SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATED, UPDATED_AT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
mapper.update: update board set BOARD_NAME = #{board_name}, BOARD_TITLE = #{board_title}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{board_content}, UPDATED_AT = NOW() WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
